description: This describes a 'run in container' action.

command.description: The command line to execute inside the container, the working directory for the command  is root ('/') in the container. The command is simply exec'd, it is not run inside a shell, so traditional shell instructions ('|', etc) won't work. To use a shell, you need to explicitly call out to that shell. Exit status of 0 is treated as live/healthy and non-zero is unhealthy.
